Extract and normalize license info from Crossref metadata

Source: R/cr_md_cc.R
get_license_md.Rd

Extract and normalize license info from Crossref metadata

get_license_md(cr)

Arguments

cr

crossref metadata using get_cr_md()

See also

Other transform: cc, cr_compliance_overview(), cr_funder_df(), cr_has_orcid(), cr_tdm_df(), license_check(), mc_predicates, vor_issue()
